snippet: David Plouffe, President Obama’s senior adviser, was paid $100,000 in speaking fees by a subsidiary of MTN, a company working with the Iranian government, before joining the White House staff.
abstract: Obama administration defends senior adviser David Plouffe for taking $100,000 in speaking fees from a subsidiary of MTN, a company working with the Iranian government, before Plouffe joined the White House staff.
